title: Two Steps From Hell - Open Conspiracy (2014)
description:
Open Conspiracy (2014)

Open Conspiracy is a private trailer music demonstration album by the leading label in the industry: Two Steps From Hell. This album marks the company's first collaboration with composers Hitesh Ceon and Nick Pittsinger, also known as Varien. They wrote five tracks for the album, in collaboration with the co-founders Nick Phoenix and Thomas Bergersen.
This album is a dark, hybrid orchestral/electronic album of espionage/action trailer music.

Track List:
1  - Open Conspiracy           (3:25)
2  - President's Assassination (3:08)
3  - Haiganon                  (2:28)
4  - Resistance Is Fatal       (3:11)
5  - Millenium Justice*        (2:14)
6  - Sindicrat*                (2:51)
7  - At the Core               (3:48)
8  - Corus Grom*               (2:18)
9  - Baghdad Underground       (2:08)
10 - Shadowbreak*              (2:39)
11 - Frayed Legacy             (2:38)
12 - Hope from Darkness        (2:04)
13 - Deadzone Five*            (2:58)
14 - Second Chance             (2:46)
15 - Dreams Collide            (2:55)
* = Composed at least in part by Varien

This album is bootlegged from a flash player online with software playthrough. I stored the files as FLAC to prevent re-encoding, but the original source is likely MP3 or Vorbis. I don't know what the original sample rate was. This is as good as I could get it. Also, the beginning and ending of the tracks is not entirely accurate, but I made sure not to remove any non-zero signal. I'd rather have a bit of silence at the end than to cut away music.
To convert to a portable, lossy file, I recommend encoding to OGG Vorbis using the latest version of aoTuV, or encoding to Opus using Mozilla's build of Opus-Tools.

Free Lossless Audio Codec (FLAC), encoded using Audacity
